security: This cable discusses the planned visit of HIDALE/2, Chief of NIGALE Service, to JEFTONS in February 1964. Sharing this information could compromise operational security by revealing planned meetings and relationships between individuals involved in intelligence activities.
summary: A secret cable from the Director to JEWAVE, relaying information about HIDALE/2's planned visit to JEFTONS in February 1964 and requesting confirmation of convenience.
summary_one_paragraph: This secret cable, dated December 10, 1963, is from the Director to JEWAVE, concerning a planned visit by HIDALE/2 (Chief of NIGALE Service) to JEFTONS from February 16-19, 1964, prior to HIDALE/2's return to Brussels. The message indicates that HIDALE/2 is a personal friend of JEFTONS and plans a personal visit to 'polish MOS tales'. The cable requests confirmation as to whether the visit is convenient and mentions that a HQS officer will escort HIDALE/2.
title: HIDALE/2 Visit to JEFTONS in February 1964
